channel.title: Comments on: Parting Thoughts on Tron Legacy
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: Jonathan Leistiko
item.dc:creator: Jonathan Leistiko
item.description: Put briefly: I'm 100% with you on this, Drey. Most of what you wrote, I'd formally recognized in my own mind, but there's more than a bit that I hadn't verbalized that was still itching at me. Thanks for giving me a handle to grasp and move it around with.
item.content:encoded: Put briefly: I’m 100% with you on this, Drey. Most of what you wrote, I’d formally recognized in my own mind, but there’s more than a bit that I hadn’t verbalized that was still itching at me. Thanks for giving me a handle to grasp and move it around with.
